DM.commands.basic.start:
👋🏻 Hey *${ctx.update.message.from.first_name}*!
*Rias* is a *multipurpose* and *useful* bot to manage your *groups* easily!

👉🏻 *Add me in a group* as an *admin* to get started!

This command can only be used in Groups!

This command can only be used in DM!

You must provide an input to use this command!
